19197.en:
Yugiri reported to Poranpan that
<pc> was inhabited by a spirit!

ユウギリは　<pc>に
精霊が宿ったことを　ポランパンに報告した！

19198.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Oh my God, is that true? If it is, that's the

<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「なんと……　そりゃ　まことか？

<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가…… 그게 사실인가?

19198.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>什么……这是真的吗？
要是真的可就太棒了……<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19198.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>什麼……這是真的嗎？
要是真的可就太棒了……<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19199.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, hey. There's no need to doubt it.
I'm the spirit Spiel!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19199.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「ヘイヘイ。動かぬ証拠を　お見せするぜ！

19199.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 헤이 헤이, 명백한 증거를 보여 주지!

19199.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>嘿嘿。我让你看确凿的证据吧！

19199.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>嘿嘿，我讓你看看確鑿的證據吧！

19200.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Oh, my! You really are inhabited by a spirit!
So,<pc> must be the chosen ranger!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19200.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 오오! 정말로 정령님이로군!

19200.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>哦哦！真的是精灵大人啊！

19201.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>As expected, Poranpan has a good grasp of

<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「さすがは　支部長さんだ。

19201.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 역시 지부장님이야.
　말이 좀 통하는데!

19201.zh-Hans:

<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>No, no, no, Spiel.

19202.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>不不，斯比尔大人才是，
您这种不像精灵的平易近人的语气，

19202.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>不不不，斯比爾大人才是，
您這種不像精靈的親近語氣，

19203.en: <start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Well... I don't know about that...! Kikikiki!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19203.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>哎呀，你过奖啦……虽然说得也没错吧。

<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>I think I already mentiones that we manage

25069.ko:

25069.zh-Hans:

<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>I was out on a mission today, in the forest,

25070.ko:

<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>Ok! I'll do some investigating and report
